description: Private Night Limited Seats Application Only Dear partners and friends, We re pleased to invite you to an exclusive GoMining side event in the heart of one of the world s most dynamic cities Hong Kong. This will be a closed, invite-only night bringing together a curated group of builders, partners, and ecosystem leaders. Attendance is limited and available only via application. We want to share this spirit with you: innovation, freedom, and long-term vision, high above the city lights. What to expect Meaningful conversations in a relaxed, informal atmosphere Breathtaking views of Hong Kong s iconic skyline Exquisite gastronomy & signature cocktails by ALTO Grill & Bar Open dialogue on current trends, challenges, and what s next Event Details Date: February 11 Time: 6:00 PM 10:00 PM Venue: ALTO Grill & Bar Address: 31/F, V Point, 18 Tang Lung St, Causeway Bay, Hong Kong Attendance Policy This is a private event with limited capacity. To attend, please fill in the application form All applications will be reviewed, and selected guests will receive a confirmation. Media partners: Crypto.news Cryptopolitan
